api_list.api_description: Get Carbon Intensity statistics (average, max, min) between specified datetimes.

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: Start datetime in ISO8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: End datetime in ISO8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ

query: I'd like to know the carbon intensity statistics over the past week in the UK and also get the current market price of a 2018 Volkswagen Golf in Brazil.
